snippet.title: Stupid operating systems or stupid operators?
snippet.description:
Stupid operating systems or stupid operators?
Someone needs to update the rules for modern living to include guidelines on preparing one's inbox for an onslaught of letters after publishing anything about the Windows operating system, and its little quirks. Our (almost) resident grumpy old guru let off a little steam this week after a computer meltdown zapped three hours â€¦
Lucy Sherriff, 22 Aug 2006
